entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain showers beginning this evening then changing to flurries near midnight. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023
